movies.title: Ghost House
movies.plot: Pil-gi has never forgotten the words of his deceased father's will "you must have a house of your own." There not having been a single member of his family who has owned a home for the last 3 generations, Pil-gi slaves for 10 long years to earn the money to finally buy a house for himself. Working as an engineer by day and as a special service taxi driver for drunks who can't drive their own cars by night, it's undeniable that he's earned the right to have his own home. Ecstatic about his accomplishment, he cries out with joy, "dad, I bought a house, it's all mine. Now, you're finally happy up there, right?" But just as his dream comes true, it turns out that there's someone or something else that holds claim of the house, and it mercilessly tries to drive him out using the actual house itself. Among other things, a couch and a kitchen knife, guided by the ghost, attacks him. And as the bizarre attacks begin to intensify, the image of an actor on TV warns him to get out of the house. ...

biography.bio: Seung-won Cha was born on June 7, 1970 in Seoul, Korea. He is an actor, known for 71: Into the Fire (2010), Blood Rain (2005) and Jail Breakers (2002).
biography.name: Seung-won Cha

biography.bio: Seo-hee Jang was born on January 5, 1971 in South Korea. She is an actress, known for Ghost House (2004), Secrets, Objects (2011) and Temptation of Wife (2008).
biography.name: Seo-hee Jang

biography.bio: Hang-Seon Jang was born on February 22, 1947 in South Korea. He is an actor, known for L'île (2000), Le roi et le clown (2005) and La 6ème victime (1999).
biography.name: Hang-Seon Jang

biography.bio: Tae-yeong Son was born on August 24, 1980 in South Korea. She is an actress, known for The Railroad (2006), Crazy Waiting (2008) and Sad Movie (2005). She has been married to Sang-Woo Kwon since September 28, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Tae-yeong Son

biography.bio: Yu-yeong Jin is an actor, known for Nakdongkaneun heureuneunga (1976), The Deep Blue Night (1985) and Just the Beginning (1977).
biography.name: Yu-yeong Jin

biography.bio: Hyeong-seong Jang was born on July 17, 1970 in South Korea. He is an actor, known for Monster Boy (2013), Man Watching Video (2003) and Spider Forest (2004).
biography.name: Hyeong-seong Jang

biography.bio: Yeo-jeong Jo was born on February 10, 1981 in South Korea. She is an actress, known for The Concubine (2012), Obsessed (2014) and Working Girl (2015).
biography.name: Yeo-jeong Jo

biography.bio: Dong-gyun Kim is an actor, known for Secret Garden (2010), Gu Family Book (2013) and Ghost House (2004).
biography.name: Dong-gyun Kim

biography.bio: Yeong-gyu Park is an actor, known for Attack the Gas Station! (1999), Flesh Trade (1989) and Let's Meet in the Sorrowful Season (1981).
biography.name: Yeong-gyu Park

actors.character: Man crawling out of TV set

biography.bio: Moo-sik Yun is an actor, known for My Love, My Bride (1990), Extras (1998) and Ghost House (2004).
biography.name: Moo-sik Yun

biography.bio: Hang-jun Zhang was born on September 17, 1969 in South Korea. He is an actor and director, known for Break Out (2002), Spring Breeze (2003) and A Great Chinese Restaurant (1999).
biography.name: Hang-jun Zhang
